gov.nih.nci.hl7.ui.properties
Class DefaultPropertiesSwitchController

java.lang.Object
  gov.nih.nci.hl7.ui.properties.DefaultPropertiesSwitchController
All Implemented Interfaces:
PropertiesSwitchController, java.awt.event.FocusListener, java.util.EventListener, javax.swing.event.TreeSelectionListener
Direct Known Subclasses:
MappingPanelPropertiesSwitchController
public class DefaultPropertiesSwitchController
extends java.lang.Object
implements PropertiesSwitchController, javax.swing.event.TreeSelectionListener, java.awt.event.FocusListener

This class provides basic functions to help update properties information along user's selection.

Version:

Field Detail

RCSID

public static java.lang.String RCSID
String that identifies the class version and solves the serial version UID problem. This String is for informational purposes only and MUST not be made final.

See Also:
JBuilder vice javac serial version UID
